entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:22 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
